entry.title: Us tooooo! @MinaProtocol bringing out the buidl000rs everywhere. Looking forward to some 🔥 @LucidSamuel_ ™️ content soon.. Make sure to tag us so...
entry.summary:
Us tooooo! @MinaProtocol bringing out the buidl000rs everywhere. Looking forward to some 🔥 @LucidSamuel_ ™️ content soon.. Make sure to tag us so we can let the devs know 👀 https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1673463534607384578
samuel.: I’m quite excited to see so many devs starting to build zkApps especially within the @developer_dao ecosystem. I probably would start sharing code bites and tips on building zkApps with the #SnarkyJS on the Mina protocol. Keep building and stay tuned! 🚀
